amendment.description: Amendment retains the existing authorization level of $12 million a year and only authorizes the program for 5 years, through 2015.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 1 printed in House Report 111-445 to retain the existing authorization level of $12 million a year and only authorizes the program for 5 years.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Bishop (UT) amendment (A002) Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 227 - 180 (Roll no. 148).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A002) offered by Mr. Bishop (UT).
